chart.title: Per capita meat consumption by type
chart.note: Data refers to meat 'available for consumption'. Actual consumption may be lower after correction for food wastage.
chart.citation: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (2024)

Meat, poultry | 00002734 || Food availab.titleShort: Yearly per capita supply of poultry meat
Meat, poultry | 00002734 || Food availab.titleLong: Yearly per capita supply of poultry meat
Meat, poultry | 00002734 || Food availab.descriptionShort: Quantity that is available for consumption at the end of the supply chain. It does not account for consumer waste, so the quantity that is actually consumed may be lower.
Meat, poultry | 00002734 || Food availab.descriptionProcessing:
* This data was originally given per-capita by FAOSTAT. We converted this data into total figures by multiplying by FAOSTAT's population.
* Per-capita values were obtained by dividing total figures by Our World in Data's population.
* For regions defined by FAOSTAT, per-capita values were calculated using FAOSTAT's original population data, if available.
Meat, poultry | 00002734 || Food availab.citationShort: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (2024) – processed by Our World in Data
Meat, poultry | 00002734 || Food availab.citationLong: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (2024) – processed by Our World in Data. “Yearly per capita supply of poultry meat” [dataset]. Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations, “Food Balances: Food Balances (-2013, old methodology and population)”; Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations, “Food Balances: Food Balances (2010-)” [original data].
